title: In Other Words...Murder
description: Death reveals all secrets.Mystery author Christopher Holmes, now comfortably married to sometimes rival, sometimes nemesis J.X. Moriarity, is starting a new career as a true crime writer when threatening anonymous notes start arriving.Even worse, Christopher's ex also arrives--asking for help locating the man he left Christopher for!It's life--and death--as usual at Chez Holmes. In other words... Murder.
author: Josh Lanyon
